title: What time will Legendary Snowball start?
body: The Legendary Snowball is supposed to start today but I'm unsure of what time it exactly starts at. I'm leaving for surgery in a few hours and I don't want to buy a legendary only to find out it's not on yet (im out of refunds T.T); If someone could tell me the exact time, I would really appreciate it. :D

replies.body:
The legendary snowball actually starts at 19:00 AEDT on December 23. We made a mistake on the version of the oce site showing - eg it didn't have the Australian time added.

If you purchased a legendary skin between 00:01 and 19:00 AEDT today can you please contact support.

 If you already contacted support, you can reopen the ticket and we'll get it cleared up.

Really sorry about this, I totally understand the frustration of not having the right start time on the site :(

Thank you, a few of my friends were very concerned that the responses they received from support were effectively a middle finger.  They will be pleased to know there is something that can be done. 

Thanks Sephyre
Thank you very much Sephyre.

Update: Riot Support refuses to gift the mystery skin because it was OCE time and not NA. If that is the case then isn't it Riot OCE's job to convert times and dates relevant to our server in an announcement? Now I basically got cheated by both Riot Support and whomever wrote the OCE Snowdown announcement just shows they copied and pasted it.

A mystery skin is only $5 not much but I still want it, not because of the price but because that is HOW you advertised it.
This leaves a bitter taste in my mouth. Can you copy paste the support conversation for clarity. I just can not believe they would blind side paying customers like that. Good luck mate.

Hi Krawia,

Thank you for taking the time to contact me.

I am sorry to hear that you did not get anything after buying Dragon Trainer Tristana. I understand how frustrating the situation is, especially since you must have been excited to receive a free Mystery Skin from our Legendary Snowball promotion.

However, I checked your transactions and found out that you actually bought Dragon Trainer Tristana before December 23, which explains why you did not obtain a Mystery Skin. This also means that I cannot give you one.

Regarding your request, I see that you already used up all your Refund Tokens. Unfortunately, I cannot provide an extra one. Each account is limited to a total of three per lifetime (one-time use only). Once they have been depleted, we are not able to restore them. Also, there is currently no way to receive more than three Refund Tokens per account.

This feature was developed to give Summoners a chance to exchange content they regretted buying or purchased accidentally, but we had to limit the number of refunds we could reasonably grant within the game.

I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
Isn't it really just false advertising? Why would they list something on an OCE specific page with dates not at all relevant to OCE...

It is, and now they tweet out the times that the legendary snowball starts and say that we wont get our mystery gift because they failed to show the time. I'm really disappointed am I supposed to check a Riot employee's twitter for details? 

https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos/status/679466644792455168

https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos/status/679467079859175424

In the OCE lol news section the post clearly states that the promotion starts on the 23rd of Decemeber. 
Given that it is the 23rd of Decemeber you're well and truly entitled to your free mystery skin. 
Keep hounding support, maybe tweet at some of the OCE Riot employees on twitter and see if you can get it resolved.

If that fails you can lodge a complaint with the ACCC for false advertising. I know it sounds extreme but they exist for a reason, I would encourage you to report your mistreatment. You can read up more about it hear: https://www.accc.gov.au/consumers/misleading-claims-advertising

> [{quoted}](name=appro,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oEpuQhhg,comment-id=000700000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-23T01:51:23.626+0000)
>
> In the OCE lol news section the post clearly states that the promotion starts on the 23rd of Decemeber. 
> Given that it is the 23rd of Decemeber you're well and truly entitled to your free mystery skin. 
> Keep hounding support, maybe tweet at some of the OCE Riot employees on twitter and see if you can get it resolved.
> 
> If that fails you can lodge a complaint with the ACCC for false advertising. I know it sounds extreme but they exist for a reason, I would encourage you to report your mistreatment. You can read up more about it hear: https://www.accc.gov.au/consumers/misleading-claims-advertising

Considering the amount of people that have unfortunately fallen victim to this it is worth considering lodging a claim; five dollars per person adds up quickly. After again checking the snowdown site, it is even more misleading than I originally thought because the dates mention AEDT which leads you to believe the 23rd is also AEDT. There is no reason that Riot shouldn't give the mystery skins to those who have purchased a legendary skin, especially since it is their fault.

http://puu.sh/m5ucp/ea305423e9.jpg
This is the response I was given in regard to the starting times

I'm sitting here at 3pm on the 23/12/15. I got Final Boss Veigar just four hours and twenty minutes ago. You gave us proper information as to when My Snowdown Shop would start yet not this? And in any case, THIS IS OCEANIA, not North America. The event should have started at the very beginning of the 23rd, not almost into the 24th. I would not have even got RP to buy the skin had the event have not been advertised in the first place.

EDIT: I also had to buy this skin earlier in the day hoping I could get the bonus skin before I go on holiday 80km out of the city for 4 weeks with no internet access.
I reckon around 7pm, i am sure it works of American time, which is really stupid, this whole snowdown times have been a complete cock up.

Yea we figured it out 7pm it will activate, but Riot said 23rd of December so everyone assumed it can be bought 12am onwards. We contact support telling that the announcement was not clear and they say too bad.
super important update. Riot will not be doing the deal until the 23rd NA time. That means they will not refund or back log. Yes if you bought something you may feel ripped off. Riot do not care.

...and why should they? We are the guys spending cash for useless things like skins, they know we will spend more later on. And yeah... We all have to stick to the great USA at all times. New update ? US 1st on the list, new champion ? US 1st on the list, new event? US 1st on the list, prostate exam by {{champion:36}} ? meeeh EU can have this one first,  they are people too.
Could someone from Riot please clarify when its gonna start, i'd hate to see more people miss out on their mystery skin.

Hey guys, sorry for the misunderstanding. I'll see if there's anything I can do here, but of course, I can't offer any promises. I'll keep you all updated if I find out anything.

EDIT:
>  From December 23 until January 8 at 18:59 AEDT, whenever you buy or are gifted a Legendary or Ultimate skin, you’ll get a free Mystery skin. If that Mystery skin is a Legendary or an Ultimate, you’ll get another Mystery skin and so on. As an added bonus, we’re doubling your chance to unlock a Legendary when you receive each Legendary Snowball Mystery skin.

~~The time at the end applies to both the start and the end of the event, and I've been told that unfortunately, no refunds or adjustments can be made without using a refund token. I'm sorry about that, guys. I know it's not the answer you were looking for. ~~
Sorry if I'm missing something, but are you a Rioter?

> [{quoted}](name=Krawia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oEpuQhhg,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-12-23T05:36:26.344+0000)
>
> Sorry if I'm missing something, but are you a Rioter?

I'm not a Rioter; I'm just passing on the information I was given.

Wuks I appreciate you trying to help but your copy paste of the dates does not aid in clarity. As someone who only speaks English, I read left to right. So when I read: 'From December 23 until January 8 at 18:59 AEDT.'
What I gather from this information is that from the start of December 23rd until January 8th at 1859 AEDT the deal will be available.

Your claim is that it should be understood as: 'From December 23 at 1859 AEDT until January 8 at 18:59 AEDT.' 

I hope you can see the difference. 

Regards Michael.

P.S this is the current live reading on the "look out! It's Snowdown! page":
'From December 23 until January 7 at 23:59 PST.'

Again most read this with a end time specified and no start time specified. Bad formatting by Riot.
Given by?
It was information provided by a Rioter in the EU Network Operations Center, as well as the Tweet by KateyKhaos

Yeah well, we figured it out. The point is the time was not included causing many (myself included) to buy a Legendary skin and not receive a mystery skin. I shouldn't have to go search a Rioter's twitter for information.

What you quoted shows no time of the start. Everyone assumed it would start December 23 12am just like weekly sales do. You just quoted the problem how is that supposed to help? Especially since they gave the time that it ends but not the start.
I feel scamed .... I have just bought a legendary skin and got nothing else {{champion:32}}
I bought Executioner Mundo today 2 PM and didin't receive the mysterious box as well... I think riot must do something about it, they just told the date, there is nothing about time.

I have been contacting Riot for the past few months now. I have mentioned to them the clarification and transparency on our OCE boards compared to NA. It is an issue. We are never informed properly of ANYTHING.

i bought pulsefire Ez, and didn't get anything ether, so i's not just me, and opinions now, do you guys think riot are opting to get us a free chest since they said on there website that it would be avaliable on the 23rd and we are all getting this skins, and not getting the chests?
Seems as if riot has been late for everything in snowdown... </3
I got Final Boss Veigar about 20 minutes ago and got nothing as well :'(
I bought Dragon Trainer Tristana half an hour ago and did not recieve a mystery gift. So I guess wait a bit :(
Rip :c

does someone know what 19:00AEDT in Belgium time is? 

my time zone is UCT(GTM) +1
can i plz know in europe time ?
half an hour after it's supposed to have started. and still no legendary snowball {{item:3151}}

IMO the peeps who've been scammed should at least make a complaint. Admittedly it probably won't change anything unless a decent amount do it.

https://www.accc.gov.au/consumers/complaints-problems/make-a-consumer-complaint
i didn't get my  mystery skin either {{item:3070}}
I want to find out tooo at what hour ... same thing with the refounds ... T.T
